comments.body: 17.99lpa...hell no,from whichever document I've seen the average is a lot closer to maybe 10-11 and that's only if you consider cse
There is a sheet attached on this subreddit that contains the stats of the 2023 batch placements. I think the average will be around 12-13, the median being around the same.
From what I've seen in different sheets and documents, Average might be close to 11-12 LPA while median around 8.
